short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a warning banner for specific AWS account numbers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AWS Console Warning: Stay Alert in Production Environments

Enhance your AWS console experience with critical visual alerts for production accounts.

Key Features:
- Instant Visual Warnings: Prominent red banners appear at the top and bottom of your AWS console when accessing watched accounts.
- Customizable Alert Message: Tailor the warning text to suit your team's needs.
- Flexible Account Watching: Easily add or remove AWS account numbers to monitor.
- Non-Intrusive Design: Warnings are visible without obstructing essential AWS console elements.

Perfect for:
✓ DevOps teams managing multiple AWS environments
✓ Companies with strict production access protocols
✓ Developers who frequently switch between development and production accounts
✓ Anyone looking to add an extra layer of caution when working in critical AWS environments

How it works:
1. Set up your watched AWS account numbers through the extension's simple interface.
2. Customize your warning message to match your team's terminology.
3. Navigate the AWS console as usual. When you access a watched account, prominent red warning banners will appear and blink for 5 seconds.

Security & Privacy:
- Your account numbers and custom messages are stored locally in your browser.
- No data is transmitted or stored externally.
- The extension only runs on aws.amazon.com domains.

Prevent costly mistakes and improve your team's AWS safety practices. Install AWS Console Warning today and add an essential safeguard to your cloud operations toolkit.

Note: This extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Amazon Web Services (AWS) in any way.
